text: In short, no, Hubdb is not a relational database, you can use it for simple things, but definitely not for stuff like WordPress.
<@U022H746532> technically you can use HubDB as a relational database with the recent addition of foreign id fields, definitely not as functional as a normal sql database though
Sure, but I wouldn’t use it to install wordpress, also you need the db drivers to install to it, and they don’t exists.
